Savor the Flavor

Explore the vibrant and delicious world of Filipino dishes. Click below to discover each flavorful recipe.

Dishes

Tosilog

A classic Filipino breakfast combo of sweet glazed pork tocino, garlicky fried rice, and a sunny-side-up egg, perfect harmony of sweet, savory, and satisfying.

Kare-Kare

A savory peanut-based stew with tender meat and crisp vegetables, best enjoyed with bagoong on the side.

Lechon Kawali

Crispy pan-fried pork belly with juicy meat and golden crackling skin, served best with a tangy dipping sauce.

Desserts

Halo-Halo

A vibrant Filipino dessert of crushed ice, evaporated milk, and a colorful mix of sweetened fruits, jellies, and beans, topped with leche flan and ube.

Mango Float

A delicious no-bake dessert made with layers of graham crackers, creamy condensed milk mixture, and sweet ripe mangoes, chilled to perfection.

Ube Halaya

A rich and creamy Filipino delicacy made from boiled purple yams, sugar, and coconut milk, often enjoyed as a spread or dessert topping.

About Us

Alva's Taste Trails is dedicated to preserving and sharing authentic Filipino cuisine. Our recipes have been passed down through generations, capturing the essence of traditional Filipino flavors while adapting to modern cooking techniques.

Each recipe has been carefully tested and perfected in our kitchen to ensure you can recreate these delicious dishes at home, no matter where you are in the world.
